resources.string: Put a name to your retro…
What would you like to point out?
This action will disable editing for all the users participating in this retro. You will be able to enable it back using the "Unlock" option
Your connection seems unavailable. Some features might be disabled
Do you really want to close your current session?
"Hey there! You are invited to join my retro \"%1$s\". Just tap on the link: %2$s"
Please, insert a valid email address
Please, insert at least 6 alphanumeric characters
Please insert a valid password (alphanumeric characters only)
This field does not match with the password above
Please, check your inbox. For safety reasons, we just sent you an email with a verification link
Please insert the email you used to create your account. We will send you the instructions to reset your password‘
Couldn\'t complete the requested operation. Please, check your connection and try again later.
You seem to be offline. Please check your network connection.
We couldn\'t find that user in our database. Do you want to sign up?
The credentials you provided are not correct. Please, check them and try again.
For safety reasons, we need you to login again.
The user you provided already exists. Do you want to sign in?
Too many requests. We have blocked them due to unusual activity. Please, try again later.
Something went wrong! Please, try again later.
We have just sent a new confirmation link to your email
Your user has been verified successfully!
This retro has been protected by the owner. You will not be able to edit.
